sentences.en: Choose a life of action, none one of ostentation.
sentences.cn: 选择行动的一生, 而不是炫耀的一生.

sentences.en: Choose a life of action, not one of ostentation. ( C . Nepos )
sentences.cn: 要选择行动的一生, 而不是炫耀的一生. ( 内波斯 )

sentences.en: Choose a life of actlorl, not one of ostentation.
sentences.cn: 要选择行动的一生, 而不是炫耀的一生.

sentences.en: Chose a life of action, not one of ostentation.
sentences.cn: 要选择行动的一生, 不要选择浮夸的一生.

sentences.en: Do you reject his ostentation and glories in this world?
sentences.cn: 你们会拒绝他对于这个世界的狂妄和自大 吗 ?

sentences.en: English : Choose a life of action, not one of ostentation.
sentences.cn: 每日名言(07.07.20)要选择行动的一生, 而不是炫耀的一生.

sentences.en: Her lifestyle was remarkably free from ostentation.
sentences.cn: 她的生活方式毫不张扬。

sentences.en: I thought that one is exaggerates; second, wins ostentation.
sentences.cn: 我以为一是言过其实, 二是哗众取宠.

sentences.en: Lavishment , ostentation and extravagance, banquet, all these are to fulfill personal selfish desire, power and battle.
sentences.cn: 浪费, 排场, 宴会都是来满足个人的私欲, 权力和斗争.

sentences.en: On the whole she had lived modestly, with a notable lack of ostentation.
sentences.cn: 大体上说，她生活俭朴，不事张扬。

sentences.en: Ostentation and extravagance patting our village really dine together, you are convinced by townspeople?
sentences.cn: 实拍我们村聚餐的排场, 城里人你服 吗 ?

sentences.en: Ostentation and revelry were ceased, for the sake of separation.
sentences.cn: 停止浮华与狂欢, 因为分开.

sentences.en: Pedantry is the unseasonable ostentation of learning.
sentences.cn: “炫学者”,不合季节卖弄学问的人.

sentences.en: The statue had beauty without ostentation.
sentences.cn: 那座雕像有一种非虚饰的美.

sentences.en: The statue has beauty without ostentation.
sentences.cn: 那座雕像有一种非虚饰的美[朴实无华之美].

sentences.en: They lived meanly and without ostentation.
sentences.cn: 他们生活很节俭,一点也不摆阔.

words.tran_cn: 招摇的；卖弄的；夸耀的；铺张的；惹人注目的

trans.tran_en: when you deliberately try to show people how rich or clever you are, in order to make them admire you
